title: Which smartphones are cheap but with long battery life? - Quora

response.answer_text: If battery is your priority, nothing beats the **REALME 2** from REALME in the sub-10K smartphone category. The phone features a large 4230mAh battery, which can easily last for two days without needing to be plugged in. It is also one of the best performer in its category, thanks to its powerful Qualcomm Snapdragon 450 SoC on board coupled with 3GB of RAM. The 6.20 inch display on the smartphone has Full HD resolution and nice viewing angles. It has a 13MP rear camera that can shoot good photographs under normal lighting conditions. If you want a little more storage and 4GB of RAM, the higher priced variant of the REALME 2 is worth upgrading to. Specs: Display: 6.20 inch, 720x1520 pixels, SoC: Qualcomm Snapdragon 450, RAM: 3GB Storage: 32GB, Camera: Rear Dual Camera - 13MP (f/2.2, 1.12-micron) + 2-megapixel (f/2.4, 1.75-micron), Front Camera - 8MP, Battery: 4230mAh OS: Android 8.1. Extra Features :- Finger print sensor,OTG supportFace Unlock1.8GHz Octa-CoreGorilla GlassRealme 2 price in India starts from Rs. 8,990.  Thanks
